quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
author: Rumi

quote: The Bay of Bengal is hit frequently by cyclones. The months of November and May, in particular, are dangerous in this regard.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Thinking is the capital, Enterprise is the way, Hard Work is the solution.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: If You Can'T Make It Good, At Least Make It Look Good.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Heart be brave. If you cannot be brave, just go. Love's glory is not a small thing.
author: Rumi

quote: It is bad for a young man to sin; but it is worse for an old man to sin.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: If You Are Out To Describe The Truth, Leave Elegance To The Tailor.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: O man you are busy working for the world, and the world is busy trying to turn you out.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: While children are struggling to be unique, the world around them is trying all means to make them look like everybody else.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: These Capitalists Generally Act Harmoniously And In Concert, To Fleece The People.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I Don'T Believe In Failure. It Is Not Failure If You Enjoyed The Process.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Do not get elated at any victory, for all such victory is subject to the will of God.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life.
author: Rumi

quote: If you even dream of beating me you'd better wake up and apologize.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Will Praise Any Man That Will Praise Me.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: One Of The Greatest Diseases Is To Be Nobody To Anybody.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I'm so fast that last night I turned off the light switch in my hotel room and was in bed before the room was dark.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: People Must Learn To Hate And If They Can Learn To Hate, They Can Be Taught To Love.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
author: Rumi

quote: The less of the World, the freer you live.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Respond to every call that excites your spirit.
author: Rumi

quote: The Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: God Doesn'T Require Us To Succeed, He Only Requires That You Try.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Speak any language, Turkish, Greek, Persian, Arabic, but always speak with love.
author: Rumi

quote: Happiness comes towards those which believe in him.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Knowledge is of two kinds: that which is absorbed and that which is heard. And that which is heard does not profit if it is not absorbed.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: When I am silent, I have thunder hidden inside.
author: Rumi

quote: Technological Progress Is Like An Axe In The Hands Of A Pathological Criminal.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: No One Would Choose A Friendless Existence On Condition Of Having All The Other Things In The World.
author: Aristotle

quote: Life is a gamble. You can get hurt, but people die in plane crashes, lose their arms and legs in car accidents; people die every day. Same with fighters: some die, some get hurt, some go on. You just don't let yourself believe it will happen to you.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The End Of Life Is To Be Like God, And The Soul Following God Will Be Like Him.
author: Socrates

quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: In every religion there is love, yet love has no religion.
author: Rumi

quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself.
author: Rumi

quote: I'm not a handsome guy, but I can give my hand to someone who needs help. Beauty is in the heart, not in the face.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: What Do I Wear In Bed? Why, Chanel No. 5, Of Course.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: A Good Head And A Good Heart Are Always A Formidable Combination.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The Soul Never Thinks Without A Picture.
author: Aristotle

quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art.
author: Rumi

quote: Let the beauty we love be what we do. There are hundreds of ways to kneel and kiss the ground.
author: Rumi

quote: If You Like Your Brother And He'S Prospering, You'Ll Be Pleased For Him.
author: Hamad Bin Isa Al Khalifa

quote: Success Is Dependent Upon The Glands - Sweat Glands.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Champions are not generated from the championship. Champion is generated from something they have in them, desires, dreams, and visions.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: No matter what is the environment around you, it is always possible to maintain your brand of integrity.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Applause Waits On Success.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Just As Courage Imperils Life, Fear Protects It.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: It'S Better To Be A Lion For A Day Than A Sheep All Your Life.
author: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: The Devil'S Voice Is Sweet To Hear.
author: Stephen King

quote: Sometimes the people with the worst past, create the best future.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Every day, nay every moment, try to do some good deed.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: No Matter What People Tell You, Words And Ideas Can Change The World.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Champions have to have the skill and the will. But the will must be stronger than the skill.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Men Occasionally Stumble Over The Truth, But Most Of Them Pick Themselves Up And Hurry Off As If Nothing Had Happened.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
author: Rumi

quote: The best revenge is to improve yourself.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: God gave me this illness to remind me that I'm not Number One; He is.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Success Is A Personal Standard, Reaching For The Highest That Is In Us, Becoming All That We Can Be.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When You Have Really Exhausted An Experience You Always Reverence And Love It.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Now you see me, now you don't. George thinks he will, but I know he won't!
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Elegance Does Not Consist In Putting On A New Dress.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: It Is Always Consoling To Think Of Suicide: In That Way One Gets Through Many A Bad Night.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Eating Words Has Never Given Me Indigestion.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: India has to be transformed into a developed nation, a prosperous nation and a healthy nation, with a value system.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: It's not bragging if you can back it up.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Wish People Would Love Everybody Else The Way They Love Me. It Would Be A Better World.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Why do I want my wife to show off her panties when the wind blows? Horses show their behinds, and cows and mules, not humans.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Words Are Only Painted Fire; A Look Is The Fire Itself.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Words, Without Power, Is Mere Philosophy.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: The cure for pain is in the pain.
author: Rumi

quote: Whatever happens, just keep smiling and lose yourself in Love.
author: Rumi

quote: Do The Right Thing. It Will Gratify Some People And Astonish The Rest.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Only the soul knows what love is.
author: Rumi

quote: Earning of livelihood by following some profession is better than living on charity.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Burdens are the foundations of ease and bitter things the forerunners of pleasure.
author: Rumi

quote: Too Many Have Dispensed With Generosity In Order To Practice Charity.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Even the greatest was once a beginner. Don't be afraid to take that first step.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: No Great Intellectual Thing Was Ever Done By Great Effort.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: To fight against one's desires is the greatest of all fights.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Innovation Distinguishes Between A Leader And A Follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: We Enjoy The Process Far More Than The Proceeds.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: When I Started Counting My Blessings, My Whole Life Turned Around.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: This being human is a guest house. Every morning a new arrival. Welcome and entertain them all!
author: Rumi

quote: All My Life I'Ve Looked At Words As Though I Were Seeing Them For The First Time.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Waiting Is Painful. Forgetting Is Painful. But Not Knowing Which To Do Is The Worse Kind Of Suffering.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Never Allow Someone To Be Your Priority While Allowing Yourself To Be Their Option.
author: Mark Twain

quote: To Jaw-Jaw Is Always Better Than To War-War.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: That'S The Real Trouble With The World, Too Many People Grow Up
author: Walt Disney

quote: It Is Easier To Stay Out Than Get Out.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The worst man is the one who sees himself as the best.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The World Breaks Everyone, And Afterward, Some Are Strong At The Broken Places.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Rule No.1: Never Lose Money. Rule No.2: Never Forget Rule No.1.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Convergence of our views on global trade issues under the WTO and our common resolve to combat terrorism provide a valuable base for mutual understanding.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Whenever You Find Yourself On The Side Of The Majority, It Is Time To Pause And Reflect.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Whatever Is Done For Love Always Occurs Beyond Good And Evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Things Should Be Made As Simple As Possible, But Not Any Simpler.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
author: Rumi

quote: All Truth Is Simple... Is That Not Doubly A Lie?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Money Is Only A Tool. It Will Take You Wherever You Wish, But It Will Not Replace You As The Driver.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The fight is won or lost far away from witnesses - behind the lines, in the gym, and out there on the road, long before I dance under those lights.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: He who avoids complaint invites happiness.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: We are the mirror - As well as the face in it.
author: Rumi

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: For 2,500 years, India has never invaded anybody.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: If Past History Was All There Was To The Game, The Richest People Would Be Librarians.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Your souls are precious and can only be equal to the price of Paradise, therefore sell them only at that price.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: A Wise Man Can Learn More From A Foolish Question Than A Fool Can Learn From A Wise Answer.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: If Allah wants for a people ill, he gives them debates and takes away from them actions.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: He who builds a masjid in the way of Allah, God will build a house for him in the paradise.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Love Is Blind; Friendship Closes Its Eyes.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Don'T Go Around Saying The World Owes You A Living. The World Owes You Nothing. It Was Here First.
author: Mark Twain

quote: An alert and learned man will take advice from any event.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: I don't count my sit-ups. I only start counting when it starts hurting. When I feel pain, that's when I start counting, because that's when it really counts.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: Luxury is an obstacle, and so is the fatness of the body.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Come, come, whoever you are. Wanderer, worshiper, lover of leaving. It doesn't matter. Ours is not a caravan of despair. come, even if you have broken your vows a thousand times. Come, yet again, come, come.
author: Rumi

quote: The Golden Age Is Before Us, Not Behind Us.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Fiction Is The Truth Inside The Lie.
author: Stephen King

quote: Believe You Can And You'Re Halfway There.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: All The Great Things Are Simple, And Many Can Be Expressed In A Single Word: Freedom, Justice, Honor, Duty, Mercy, Hope.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Allah's the Arabic term for God. Stand up for God, fight for God, work for God and do the right thing, and go the right way, things will end up in your corner.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Anger Is Never Without A Reason, But Seldom With A Good One.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Good Actions Are A Guard Against The Blows Of Adversity.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: Use the same measure for selling that you use for purchasing.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: The Secret Of Getting Ahead Is Getting Started
author: Mark Twain

quote: I Don'T Know The Key To Success, But The Key To Failure Is Trying To Please Everybody.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Real Loss Is Only Possible When You Love Something More Than You Love Yourself.
author: Robin Williams

quote: This Is The First Convention Of The Space Age - Where A Candidate Can Promise The Moon And Mean It.
author: David Brinkley

quote: I Don'T Like That Man. I Must Get To Know Him Better.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: To Shipbrokers, Coal Was Black Gold.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: History, Despite Its Wrenching Pain, Cannot Be Unlived, But If Faced With Courage, Need Not Be Lived Again.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Everyone who is taken by death asks for more time, while everyone who still has time makes excuses for procrastination.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: I wonder at a man who loses hope of salvation when the door of repentance is open for him.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Close your eyes, fall in Love, stay there.
author: Rumi

quote: I Guess I Don'T So Much Mind Being Old, As I Mind Being Fat And Old.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It will be a killer, and a chiller, and a thriller, when I get the gorilla in Manila.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Dream Of An Africa Which Is In Peace With Itself.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The Difference Between A Mountain And A Molehill Is Your Perspective.
author: Al Neuharth

quote: I Am Certainly Not One Of Those Who Need To Be Prodded. In Fact, If Anything, I Am The Prod.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: To the people that have said I'm too small, I'm not fast enough, I don't have what it takes, I'm not strong enough. THANK YOU.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: There is a King Who is aware of every Mask you put on.
author: Rumi

quote: Be patient; patience is a pillar of faith.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: The Very Ink With Which History Is Written Is Merely Fluid Prejudice.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I was the first one in the gym, and the last one to leave.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Art Is The Proper Task Of Life.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The Roots Of Education Are Bitter, But The Fruit Is Sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: Run away from greatness and greatness will follow you.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: You may learn to imitate a birdcall, but do you experience what the nightingale feels for the rose?
author: Rumi

quote: Bad Men Are Full Of Repentance.
author: Aristotle

quote: Blessed is he whose own faults keep him from seeing the faults of others.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: The most helpless person is the one who is helpless in reforming himself.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: He who fears to weep, should learn to be kind to those who weep.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: My wealth is in my knowledge of self, love, and spirituality.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: He who aspires to paradise should learn to deal with people with kindness.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: All God's creatures are His family; and he is the most beloved of God who tries to do most good to God's creatures.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: When I Do Good, I Feel Good. When I Do Bad, I Feel Bad. That'S My Religion.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Women are not equal with men, that's sure. When the woman is in danger she always looks to the man for help. We are superior by nature. The black or white woman needn't worry in life because the world is ruled by the white man.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If you love someone, you are always joined with them - in joy, in absence, in solitude, in strife.
author: Rumi

quote: I Am A Deeply Religious Nonbeliever - This Is A Somewhat New Kind Of Religion.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It Is The Supreme Art Of The Teacher To Awaken Joy In Creative Expression And Knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The best companion and helper is admirable morals.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Man Will Do Many Things To Get Himself Loved, He Will Do All Things To Get Himself Envied.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When you seek advice, do not withhold any facts from the person whose advice you seek.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: I have never regretted my silence. As for my speech, I have regretted it over and over again.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Don't read success stories, you will only get a message. Read failure stories, you will get some ideas to get success.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I Have Nothing To Offer But Blood, Toil, Tears And Sweat.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I died as a mineral and became a plant, I died as a plant and rose to animal, I died as an animal and I was Man. Why should I fear? When was I less by dying?
author: Rumi

quote: All Men'S Souls Are Immortal, But The Souls Of The Righteous Are Immortal And Divine.
author: Socrates

quote: Abstinence from sins is better than seeking help afterwards.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Inside the Great Mystery that is, we don't really own anything. What is this competition we feel then, before we go, one at a time, through the same gate?
author: Rumi

quote: The only lasting beauty is the beauty of the heart.
author: Rumi

quote: Change Your Opinions, Keep To Your Principles; Change Your Leaves, Keep Intact Your Roots.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Many Marriages Would Be Better If The Husband And The Wife Clearly Understood That They Are On The Same Side.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Strong And Bitter Words Indicate A Weak Cause.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: A man who views the world the same at fifty as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Give up to grace. The ocean takes care of each wave 'til it gets to shore. You need more help than you know.
author: Rumi

quote: The Superior Man Acts Before He Speaks, And Afterwards Speaks According To His Action.
author: Confucius

quote: We'Re Getting Hurt, But I'M A Long-Term Investor.
author: Al Waleed Bin Talal

quote: Recitation of the Qur'an without contemplation and thought is futile.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Success is not achieved by winning all the time. Real success comes when we rise after we fall. Some mountains are higher than others. Some roads steeper than the next. There are hardships and setbacks but you cannot let them stop you. Even on the steepest road you must not turn back.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: A Riot Is The Language Of The Unheard.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The Law Is Reason, Free From Passion.
author: Aristotle

quote: The people who abandon Jihad fall a victim to humility and degradation.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: We are all born with a divine fire in us. Our efforts should be to give wings to this fire and fill the world with the glow of its goodness.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Woman Was God'S Second Mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: All black Americans have slave names. They have white names; names that the slave master has given to them.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I'm most proud of my family.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: And you? When will you begin that long journey into yourself?
author: Rumi

quote: How many lessons there are and how little they are taken.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: What One Writer Can Make In The Solitude Of One Room Is Something No Power Can Easily Destroy.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: If There Is Something To Pardon In Everything, There Is Also Something To Condemn.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: At Home I Am A Nice Guy: But I Don'T Want The World To Know. Humble People, I'Ve Found, Don'T Get Very Far.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: No amount of guilt can change the past and no amount of worrying can change the future.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Not the ones speaking the same language, but the ones sharing the same feeling understand each other.
author: Rumi

quote: It Is Better To Deserve Honors And Not Have Them Than To Have Them And Not Deserve Them.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Success Is A Lousy Teacher. It Seduces Smart People Into Thinking They Can'T Lose.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Cursed is the man who dies, but the evil done by him survives.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: The Quality, Not The Longevity, Of One'S Life Is What Is Important.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Age is whatever you think it is. You are as old as you think you are.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Derivatives Are Financial Weapons Of Mass Destruction.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Don't you know yet? It is your Light that lights the worlds.
author: Rumi

quote: Hold on to your Salah, because if you lose that, you will lose everything else.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: I am not this hair. I am not this skin. I am the soul that lives within.
author: Rumi

quote: Be Faithful In Small Things Because It Is In Them That Your Strength Lies.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: He who sleeps without offering the night prayer, may he never enjoy a sound sleep.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: I Was Influenced A Lot By Those Around Me - There Was A Lot Of Singing That Went On In The Cotton Fields.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: Greed is permanent slavery.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Everything That We See Is A Shadow Cast By That Which We Do Not See.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: To The Master'S Honor All Must Turn, Each In Its Track, Without A Sound, Forever Tracing Newton'S Ground.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Women are the field that produces our nation. And if you can't protect your women, you can't protect your nation.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: To Give Victory To The Right, Not Bloody Bullets, But Peaceful Ballots Only, Are Necessary.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The Ache For Home Lives In All Of Us, The Safe Place Where We Can Go As We Are And Not Be Questioned.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You Were Born To Win, But To Be A Winner, You Must Plan To Win, Prepare To Win, And Expect To Win.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Education Is What Remains After One Has Forgotten What One Has Learned In School.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I'll tell you how I'd like to be remembered: As a black man who won the heavyweight title - Who has humorous and who never looked down on those who looked up to him - A man who stood for freedom, justice and equality - And I wouldn't even mind if folks forgot how pretty I was.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Tolerance and understanding won't 'trickle down' in our society any more than wealth does.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It Does Not Do To Dwell On Dreams And Forget To Live.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: Courtesy costs nothing, but buys everything.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: If patience and gratitude had been she camels, it would have mattered little on which I rode.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Success Consists Of Going From Failure To Failure Without Loss Of Enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: When you advise any person you should be guided by the fear of God.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: A Candle never Loses any of its Light while Lighting up another candle.
author: Rumi

quote: What Can You Do To Promote World Peace? Go Home And Love Your Family.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love Is The Only Force Capable Of Transforming An Enemy Into Friend.
author: Martin Luther King  Jr.

quote: Children make you want to start life over.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Our Scientific Power Has Outrun Our Spiritual Power. We Have Guided Missiles And Misguided Men.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: After Coming Into Contact With A Religious Man I Always Feel I Must Wash My Hands.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I Am The Greatest, I Said That Even Before I Knew I Was.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: He who went to the kings to seek favors went away from Allah.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Oh writer! An Angel watches over all you write. Make your writing meaningful for it will eventually return to you and you will be questioned about what you wrote.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Speak a new language so that the world will be a new world.
author: Rumi

quote: The sweetness of life lies in dispensing with formalities.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: O Love, O pure deep Love, be here, be now, be all...
author: Rumi

quote: I Never Did A Day'S Work In My Life. It Was All Fun.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: We have not invaded anyone. We have not conquered anyone. We have not grabbed their land, their culture, their history and tried to enforce our way of life on them.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I have been a seeker and I still am, but I stopped asking the books and the stars. I started listening to the teaching of my Soul.
author: Rumi

quote: Be active! Take on responsibility! Work for the things you believe in. If you do not, you are surrendering your fate to others.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Don'T Tell Fish Stories Where The People Know You; But Particularly, Don'T Tell Them Where They Know The Fish.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Developing nations want to become developed nations.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: We are born of love. Love is our mother.
author: Rumi

quote: I Just Feel Happy To Be In America, Like I Said, It'S The Most Beautiful Country In The World.
author: Ahmed Ali

quote: Do for this life as if you live forever, do for the afterlife as if you will die tomorrow.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: You Know You Are On The Road To Success If You Would Do Your Job, And Not Be Paid For It.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: A Compliment Is Something Like A Kiss Through A Veil.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Last night I had a dream. When I got to Africa, I had one hell of a rumble. I had to beat Tarzan's behind first, for claiming to be King of the Jungle.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Have Found The Paradox, That If You Love Until It Hurts, There Can Be No More Hurt, Only More Love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: After Climbing A Great Hill, One Only Finds That There Are Many More Hills To Climb.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: An Explanation Of Cause Is Not A Justification By Reason.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: His hands can't hit what his eyes can't see.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Life Loves The Liver Of It.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Light up the fire of love inside and blaze the thoughts away.
author: Rumi

quote: Don't sit and wait. Get out there, feel life. Touch the sun, and immerse in the sea.
author: Rumi

quote: There is a way between voice and presence, where information flows. In disciplined silence it opens; with wandering talk it closes.
author: Rumi

quote: Strength Does Not Come From Physical Capacity. It Comes From An Indomitable Will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: This life is not real. I conquered the world and it did not bring me satisfaction.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It'S Fine To Celebrate Success But It Is More Important To Heed The Lessons Of Failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Stubbornness destroys good advice.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: My definition of evil is unfriendliness.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Pray, And Let God Worry.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Miracles Do Not, In Fact, Break The Laws Of Nature.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: There is no greater wealth than wisdom, no greater poverty than ignorance; no greater heritage than culture and no greater support than consultation.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: We Are What We Believe We Are.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: I Feel Much Freer Now That I Am Certain The Pope Is The Antichrist.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Darkness Cannot Drive Out Darkness; Only Light Can Do That. Hate Cannot Drive Out Hate; Only Love Can Do That.
author: Martin Luther King  Jr.

quote: A developed India by 2020, or even earlier, is not a dream. It need not be a mere vision in the minds of many Indians. It is a mission we can all take up - and succeed.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: As To The Mental Essence, We Find It In Infants Devoid Of Every Mental Form.
author: Avicenna

quote: Let not your love become attachment, nor your hate become destruction.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: He Is Winding The Watch Of His Wit; By And By It Will Strike.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Don't be sad! Because God sends hope in the most desperate moments. Don't forget, the heaviest rain comes out of the darkest clouds.
author: Rumi

quote: There Cannot Be A God Because If There Were One, I Could Not Believe That I Was Not He.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Don't get lost in your pain, know that one day your pain will become your cure.
author: Rumi

quote: Silence gives answers.
author: Rumi

quote: A Man Who Won'T Die For Something Is Not Fit To Live.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Solitude is better than the society of evil persons.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: The Only Real Progress Lies In Learning To Be Wrong All Alone.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Drink! For You Know Not Whence You Came Nor Why: Drink! For You Know Not Why You Go, Nor Where.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: I Shall The Effect Of This Good Lesson Keeps As Watchman To My Heart.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Vanity prevents improvement.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Every Day, Nay Every Moment, Try To Do Some Good Deed.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: Money cannot help lifting its head.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: To Think Of Shadows Is A Serious Thing.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: If We Really Want To Love We Must Learn How To Forgive.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Music Expresses That Which Cannot Be Put Into Words.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love Is A Fruit In Season At All Times, And Within Reach Of Every Hand.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: To be able to give away riches is mandatory if you wish to possess them. This is the only way that you will be truly rich.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: We Continue To Shape Our Personality All Our Life. If We Knew Ourselves Perfectly, We Should Die.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Your longing for ME is my message to you, All your attempts to reach ME, Are in reality MY attempts to reach you.
author: Rumi

quote: If you are greeted then return the greetings more warmly. If you are favored, then repay the obligation manifold; but he who takes the initiative will always excel in merit.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens.
author: Rumi

quote: Prejudice comes from being in the dark; sunlight disinfects it.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Never Put Off Till Tomorrow What You Can Do The Day After Tomorrow.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Nothing hurts a good soul and kind heart more than to live amongst people who can't understand it.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Hope Is The Dream Of A Waking Man.
author: Aristotle

quote: We Make A Living By What We Get, But We Make A Life By What We Give.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I am so mad with love that mad men say to me - be still!
author: Rumi

quote: If you only say one prayer in a day make it Thank You.
author: Rumi

quote: Life'S Most Persistent And Urgent Question Is, 'What Are You Doing For Others?'
author: Martin Luther King  Jr.

quote: Confidence and hard work is the best medicine to kill the disease called failure. It will make you successful person.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Allah's Generosity is connected to gratitude, and gratitude is linked to increase in His generosity. The generosity of Allah will not stop increasing unless the gratitude of the servant ceases.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Bear sorrows and calamities patiently, otherwise you will never be happy.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: One lesson that every nation can learn from China is to focus more on creating village-level enterprises, quality health services and educational facilities.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Like Slavery And Apartheid, Poverty Is Not Natural. It Is Man-Made And It Can Be Overcome And Eradicated By The Actions Of Human Beings.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Never Do Anything Against Conscience Even If The State Demands It.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: When you feel a peaceful joy, that's when you are near truth.
author: Rumi

quote: I grow silent. Dear soul, you speak.
author: Rumi

quote: All wars signify the failure of conflict resolution mechanisms, and they need post-war rebuilding of faith, trust and confidence.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: What you're thinking is what you're becoming.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Paint Self-Portraits Because I Am So Often Alone, Because I Am The Person I Know Best.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: In Music The Passions Enjoy Themselves.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: That's how you came here, like a star without a name. Move across the night sky with those anonymous lights.
author: Rumi

quote: Your light is more magnificent than sunrise or sunset.
author: Rumi

quote: No One Has Ever Become Poor By Giving.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Whatever pearl you seek, look for the pearl within the pearl!
author: Rumi

quote: India should walk on her own shadow - we must have our own development model.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: You have escaped the cage. Your wings are stretched out. Now fly.
author: Rumi

quote: Work As If You Were To Live A Hundred Years. Pray As If You Were To Die Tomorrow.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Whenever you are alone, remind yourself that God has sent everyone else away so that there is only you and Him.
author: Rumi

quote: When a man puts me a question, I judge of his intelligence.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: There Has Never Yet Been A Man In Our History Who Led A Life Of Ease Whose Name Is Worth Remembering.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: A teacher should have a creative mind.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The criterion of action is that todays work should not be deferred till the following day.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The chess master says nothing, other than moving the silent chess piece.
author: Rumi

quote: Reader, Suppose You Were An Idiot. And Suppose You Were A Member Of Congress. But I Repeat Myself.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I Love Sleep. My Life Has The Tendency To Fall Apart When I'M Awake, You Know?
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: He That Can Have Patience Can Have What He Will.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Champions Keep Playing Until They Get It Right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Without Music, Life Would Be A Mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The worst of our faults is our interest in other people's faults.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: I Think It'S Nice For Women To Try To Be Sexy For Their Man.
author: Salma Hayek

quote: My impression of the American people can be summarized by a quotation from Benjamin Franklin, Those things that hurt instruct! I realized that people in this part of the world meet their problems head on. They attempt to get out of them rather than suffer them.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Boys, You Must Strive To Find Your Own Voice, Because The Longer You Wait To Begin The Less Likely You Are To Find It At All.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Be dignified, honest and truthful.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Women are not a garment you wear and undress however you like. They are honored and have their rights.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Love Matches, So Called, Have Illusion For Their Father And Need For Their Mother.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A Lot Of People Quit Looking For Work As Soon As They Find A Job.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If We Open A Quarrel Between Past And Present, We Shall Find That We Have Lost The Future.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Even If I Knew That Tomorrow The World Would Go To Pieces, I Would Still Plant My Apple Tree.
author: Martin Luther

quote: One who rushes madly after inordinate desire, runs the risk of encountering destruction and death.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Getting Over A Painful Experience Is Much Like Crossing Monkey Bars. You Have To Let Go At Some Point In Order To Move Forward.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: You Have Enemies? Good. That Means You'Ve Stood Up For Something, Sometime In Your Life.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: It's the repetition of affirmations that leads to belief. And once that belief becomes a deep conviction, things begin to happen.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If I Were Not A Physicist, I Would Probably Be A Musician. I Often Think In Music. I Live My Daydreams In Music. I See My Life In Terms Of Music.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: We will be remembered only if we give to our younger generation a prosperous and safe India, resulting out of economic prosperity coupled with civilizational heritage.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: There is a field beyond all notions of right and wrong. Come, meet me there.
author: Rumi

quote: Even The Darkest Night Will End And The Sun Will Rise.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Feet, What Do I Need You For When I Have Wings To Fly?
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Whoever Would Overthrow The Liberty Of A Nation Must Begin By Subduing The Freeness Of Speech.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Spread Love Everywhere You Go. Let No One Ever Come To You Without Leaving Happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: One of the very important characteristics of a student is to question. Let the students ask questions.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: To fight against the infidels is Jihad; but to fight against your evil self is greater Jihad.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: At home I am a nice guy: but I don't want the world to know. Humble people, I've found, don't get very far.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: May Allah bless the man who says less and does more.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: My place is placeless, a trace of the traceless.
author: Rumi

quote: Success Is Not Final, Failure Is Not Fatal: It Is The Courage To Continue That Counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Plants And Minerals Are Bound To Predestination. The Faithful Is Only Bound To The Divine Orders.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: As We Express Our Gratitude, We Must Never Forget That The Highest Appreciation Is Not To Utter Words, But To Live By Them.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Death is the easiest of all things after it, and the hardest of all things before it.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: When In Doubt, Go For The Dick Joke.
author: Robin Williams

quote: I Do Not Think Much Of A Man Who Is Not Wiser Today Than He Was Yesterday.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Don'T Be Distracted By Criticism. Remember ~ The Only Taste Of Success Some People Have Is When They Take A Bite Out Of You.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Words are a pretext. It is the inner bond that draws one person to another, not words.
author: Rumi

quote: Where There Is No Struggle, There Is No Strength.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The Function Of Muscle Is To Pull And Not To Push, Except In The Case Of The Genitals And The Tongue.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Through love, all pain will turn to medicine.
author: Rumi

quote: Allah will help him who moves in the way of Allah.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Do Not Be Embarrassed By Your Failures, Learn From Them And Start Again.
author: Richard Branson

quote: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: He who prays five times a day is in the protection of God, and he who is protected by God cannot be harmed by anyone.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: I Find Hope In The Darkest Of Days, And Focus In The Brightest. I Do Not Judge The Universe.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The wisest among you is he whose sustenance is the fear of Allah.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Because I cannot sleep I make music in the night.
author: Rumi

quote: Strive Not To Be A Success, But Rather To Be Of Value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If You Tell The Truth, You Don'T Have To Remember Anything.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Disneyland Will Never Be Completed. It Will Continue To Grow As Long As There Is Imagination Left In The World.
author: Walt Disney

quote: If You Have Good Thoughts They Will Shine Out Of Your Face Like Sunbeams And You Will Always Look Lovely.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: If you wish to be a mine of jewels, open the deep ocean within your heart.
author: Rumi

quote: Let me alone, and go in search of someone else.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: A True friend is one who sees a fault, gives you advice and who defends you in your absence.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: You Can Tell Whether A Man Is Clever By His Answers. You Can Tell Whether A Man Is Wise By His Questions.
author: Naguib Mahfouz

quote: No One Changes The World Who Isn'T Obsessed.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The best deed of a great man is to forgive and forget.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: One May Sometimes Tell A Lie, But The Grimace That Accompanies It Tells The Truth.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Do not hate what you do not know, for the greater part of knowledge consists of what you do not know.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Love Begins At Home, And It Is Not How Much We Do... But How Much Love We Put In That Action.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: My Religion Is Very Simple. My Religion Is Kindness.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: There are forces in life working for you and against you. One must distinguish the beneficial forces from the malevolent ones and choose correctly between them.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Beware Of Little Expenses. A Small Leak Will Sink A Great Ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: All My Life Through, The New Sights Of Nature Made Me Rejoice Like A Child.
author: Marie Curie

quote: He who indulges in falsehood will find the paths of paradise shut to him.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Man Is Descended From A Hairy, Tailed Quadruped, Probably Arboreal In Its Habits.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you.
author: Rumi

quote: People of the world don't look at themselves, and so they blame one another.
author: Rumi

quote: The Truth. It Is A Beautiful And Terrible Thing, And Must Therefore Be Treated With Great Caution.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: The Object Of The Superior Man Is Truth.
author: Confucius

quote: Live amongst people in such a manner that if you die they weep over you and if you are alive they crave for your company.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Pride In The Case Of A Rich Man Is Bad, But Pride In The Case Of A Poor Man Is Worse.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: Tell Me And I Forget. Teach Me And I Remember. Involve Me And I Learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Why Is It That We Rejoice At A Birth And Grieve At A Funeral? It Is Because We Are Not The Person Involved.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If You Have A Particular Faith Or Religion, That Is Good. But You Can Survive Without It.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: You don't want no pie in the sky when you die, You want something here on the ground while you're still around.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth.
author: Rumi

quote: Purify your eyes, and see the pure world. Your life will fill with radiant forms.
author: Rumi

quote: Associating with the wise and the knowledgeable people adds to the prestige of a person.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: There Is No Darkness But Ignorance.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: All Great Achievements Require Time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: One Does Not Leave A Convivial Party Before Closing Time.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You Are Not Only Responsible For What You Say, But Also For What You Do Not Say.
author: Martin Luther

quote: So Go Ahead. Fall Down. The World Looks Different From The Ground.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: When We Lose One Blessing, Another Is Often Most Unexpectedly Given In Its Place.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Intelligence Is The Wife, Imagination Is The Mistress, Memory Is The Servant.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: It is a matter of shame that in the morning the birds should be awake earlier than you.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: What Doesn'T Kill Us Makes Us Stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The weakest man is the one who is able to correct his moral defects, but doesn't take action.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: I Do Not Need The Idea Of God To Explain The World I Live In.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: The highest person is he who is of most use to humankind.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Common Sense Is The Collection Of Prejudices Acquired By Age Eighteen.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Do not let your difficulties fill you with anxiety, after all it is only in the darkest nights that stars shine more brightly.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Preserve the sayings of those people who are indifferent to the world. They say only that what Allah wishes them to say.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, “Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.”
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The Only Way To Do News On Television Is Not To Be Terrified Of It.
author: David Brinkley

quote: It Is A Mistake To Look Too Far Ahead. Only One Link Of The Chain Of Destiny Can Be Handled At A Time.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I'll destroy you. I am the master of disaster.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I fear the day when the Kuffar are proud of their falsehood, and the Muslims are shy of their faith.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: It Is From Books That Wise People Derive Consolation In The Troubles Of Life.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Take Things As They Are. Punch When You Have To Punch. Kick When You Have To Kick.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Do not overeat; that invites disease.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Denial Ain'T Just A River In Egypt.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life Well Spent Is Long.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
author: Rumi

quote: Be patient where you sit in the dark. The dawn is coming.
author: Rumi

quote: Often It Does Seem A Pity That Noah And His Party Did Not Miss The Boat.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A heart filled with love is like a phoenix that no cage can imprison.
author: Rumi

quote: No boxer in the history of boxing has had Parkinson's. There's no injury in my brain that suggests that the illness came from boxing.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: He Who Is Fixed To A Star Does Not Change His Mind.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Imagination Will Often Carry Us To Worlds That Never Were. But Without It We Go Nowhere.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Nothing Good Ever Comes Of Violence.
author: Martin Luther

quote: If Light Is In Your Heart You Will Find Your Way Home.
author: Rumi

quote: To Be A Christian Means To Forgive The Inexcusable Because God Has Forgiven The Inexcusable In You.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Don't forget your own self while preaching to others.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: If That'S There, I Believe That Technology Will Probably Step Up To Their Part Of It.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: If they can make penicillin out of moldy bread, then they can sure make something out of you.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Thoughts Are The Shadows Of Our Feelings - Always Darker, Emptier And Simpler.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It Is The Supreme Art Of The Teacher To Awaken Joy In Creative Expression And Knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: He who does not live in the way of his beliefs starts to believe in the way he lives.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Failure Is Not The Opposite Of Success; It'S Part Of Success.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
author: Rumi

quote: Risk Comes From Not Knowing What You'Re Doing.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Do not be too hard, lest you be broken; do not be too soft, lest you be squeezed.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Champions come and go, but to be legendary you got to have heart, more heart than the next man, more than anyone in the world.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It Is Normal To Give Away A Little Of One'S Life In Order Not To Lose It All.
author: Albert Camus

quote: What is politics? Political system is equal to development politics plus political politics.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I don't count my situps. I only start counting once it starts hurting.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: How could they say that my religion, Islam was a 'race hate' religion after all the plunder and enslavement and domination of my people by white Christians in the name of white supremacy?
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: To make one good action succeed another, is the perfection of goodness.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Loving one another is half of wisdom.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: There is no harm in patience, and no profit in lamentation. Death is easier to bear (than) that which precedes it, and more severe than that which comes after it. Remember the death of the Apostle of God, and your sorrow will be lessened.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: At Twenty Years Of Age The Will Reigns; At Thirty, The Wit; And At Forty, The Judgment.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: We can't be brave without fear.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Morality Is The Herd-Instinct In The Individual.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Truly great people in history never wanted to be great for themselves. All they wanted was the chance to do good for others and be close to God.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The Will To Win, The Desire To Succeed, The Urge To Reach Your Full Potential... These Are The Keys That Will Unlock The Door To Personal Excellence.
author: Confucius

quote: The Earth is the most powerful and energetic planet.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Never explain yourself to anyone, because the one who likes you would not need it, and the one dislikes you wouldn't believe it.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: People Say Satire Is Dead. It'S Not Dead; It'S Alive And Living In The White House.
author: Robin Williams

quote: If my mind can conceive it, and my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: A Question That Sometimes Drives Me Hazy: Am I Or Are The Others Crazy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: He who busies himself with things other than improvement of his own self becomes perplexed in darkness and entangled in ruin. His evil spirits immerse him deep in vices and make his bad actions seem handsome.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Impossible is nothing.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: In the matter of justice, all should be equal in your eyes.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: A Well-Spent Day Brings Happy Sleep.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Don't engage your heart in grief over the past or you wont be ready for what is coming.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Two things cause people to be destroyed: fear of poverty and seeking superiority through pride.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: When a man says I cannot, he has made a suggestion to himself. He has weakened his power of accomplishing that which otherwise would have been accomplished.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Your Most Unhappy Customers Are Your Greatest Source Of Learning.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Thinking should become your capital asset, no matter whatever ups and downs you come across in your life.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I'm the best. I just haven't played yet.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Your worst enemy is hiding within yourself, and that enemy is your nafs or false ego.
author: Rumi

quote: Do not put off today's work for tomorrow.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Things Won Are Done, Joy'S Soul Lies In The Doing.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: In Order To Be An Immaculate Member Of A Flock Of Sheep, One Must Above All Be A Sheep Oneself.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I'Ve Learned That Making A 'Living' Is Not The Same Thing As 'Making A Life'.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: What hurts you, blesses you. Darkness is your candle.
author: Rumi

quote: The one who has no control over his desires has no control over his mind.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: A moment of patience in a moment of anger prevents a thousand moments of regret.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Man comes from a drop of semen and leaves as a piece of dust. He doesn't know when he came and he doesn't know when he's leaving, yet he walks on the earth thinking he knows everything.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: I searched for God and found only myself. I searched for myself and found only God.
author: Rumi

quote: There Are Two Sides To Every Issue: One Side Is Right And The Other Is Wrong, But The Middle Is Always Evil.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Listen with ears of tolerance! See through the eyes of compassion! Speak with the language of love.
author: Rumi

quote: Let Me Alone, And Go In Search Of Someone Else.
author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quote: Dislike in yourself what you dislike in others.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: People Ask The Difference Between A Leader And A Boss. The Leader Leads, And The Boss Drives.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The wisest man is he who can account for his actions.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: I'M Not Even Kind Of A Lesbian.
author: Oprah Winfrey
